themes.name: Collaboration
themes.evidence: I run weekly tech huddles, pair program on tricky bugs, and keep notes public to reduce handoffs.

themes.name: Data-driven problem solving
themes.evidence: I added hybrid reranking and improved chunking; precision@10 rose from 0.42 to 0.71.

trait_summary.Collaboration: Actively promotes team collaboration and documentation; organizes regular syncs and pair programming.
trait_summary.Problem-solving: Data-driven: uses experiments and metrics to validate changes.

follow_up_questions: Describe a time you had to change your technical approach based on metrics â€” what did you measure and how did you decide?
How do you ensure knowledge transfer when you mentor junior engineers?
When a proposed change improved a metric, how did you validate it wasn't due to data leakage or test bias?
analysis.bias_check: No demographic attributes were used or inferred. Analysis focused only on behavior-related language and evidence snippets.
